original_text: A person may touch the dead body of an animal that is not clean. If he does, that person is not clean either. They must keep him separate from the other people until the evening.
korean_text: 이런 것은 너희를 부정하게 하나니 누구든지 이것들의 주검을 만지면 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: A person may touch the dead body of an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 동물의 죽은 시체를 만질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that person is not clean either
They must keep him separate from the other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 다른 사람들에게서 분리시켜야 한다
